name: axios-retry-after
description: A tiny HTTP 429 Retry-After interceptor for axios

scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator -u compwright -p axios-retry-after && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"

author: Jonathon Hill <jhill9693@gmail.com>
